title: Important: firefox security update
description:
Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser, designed for standards compliance, performance, and portability.
This update upgrades Firefox to version 91.12.0 ESR.
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

references.title: Update information for CVE-2022-2505 is retrieved from Red Hat
Update information for CVE-2022-36318 is retrieved from Red Hat
Update information for CVE-2022-36319 is retrieved from Red Hat
